memberdefs.name: NCCL_CONFIG_INITIALIZER
memberdefs.initializer: { \ sizeof(ncclConfig_t), /* size */ \ 0xcafebeef, /* magic */ \ NCCL_VERSION(NCCL_MAJOR, NCCL_MINOR, NCCL_PATCH), /* version */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_INT, /* blocking */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_INT, /* cgaClusterSize */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_INT, /* minCTAs */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_INT, /* maxCTAs */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_PTR, /* netName */ \ NCCL_CONFIG_UNDEF_INT /* splitShare */ \ }
